name: Six Shooter (artence)
description:
Six Shooter

A small top-down shooter project made in 24 hours. This project's purpose was to test my skills in unity and practice my time management while doing small indie games.

Six Shooter_v1.86
  • There are some bugs in the game volume slider where it will set the volume to zero every time the game restarts.
  • Fade in and out doesn't work sometimes. [I tried to fix this, but I had no time]
  • The audio for the boss fight is very broken.
  • Joystick controls did not work as intended.

PS: I'm not sure if I will update this game or leave it as it is...

Anyways thanks for playing!
